tool_description: Validates and retrieves current stock levels for specified SKUs across one or more warehouse locations, checking data integrity and availability.

sku_list.description: List of SKU identifiers to validate

location_codes.description: List of warehouse/location codes to check

include_reserved.description: Whether to include reserved inventory in calculations

error_messages: Invalid SKU format: One or more SKUs contain invalid characters or exceed length limits.
Location not found: One or more location codes do not exist in the system.
SKU not found: One or more SKUs do not exist in inventory database.
Data access error: Unable to retrieve stock data due to system connectivity issues.
usage: Provide sku_list and location_codes arrays to validate current stock levels. Set include_reserved to false if you want to exclude reserved inventory from totals.

validation_status.description: Overall validation result: success, partial, or failed

stock_levels.description: Current stock quantities corresponding to each SKU-location combination

location_status.description: Status of each location: active, inactive, or maintenance

last_updated.description: Timestamp of last stock level update
